amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that FERC would consider and respond to local and State concerns submitted as part of a permit application before a natural gas pipeline permit is approved.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-272 to toll the time limits until FERC has considered and responded to state or local objections or concerns about the pipeline project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 236 (Roll no. 607).
